method.name: SetDebugMode
method.arg: True to set verbose logging, false to turn it off.

method.name: ForceFlash
method.tp:docstring: Act as though a modem with the given device ID appeared and needs flashing.
method.arg: Device ID of the modem to attempt to force-flash.
A list of optional arguments to be used when force-flashing. Supported values: "carrier_uuid", "variant", "use_modems_fw_info".

signal.name: UpdateFirmwareCompleted
signal.tp:docstring: Triggered when a flashing sequence is completed. Return error on failure. This signal could also be triggered as a failure during the daemon init sequence.
